dataIdInfo.idAbs: Loads features from 1 or more NATO Vector Graphics documents into Feature Classes

tool.name: loadNVG

param.name: in_nvg
param.dialogReference: The NVG file(s) to be loaded. The name of the file will be used to generate a unique output featrue class name with point, polyline, polygon and multipoint appended.

param.name: outGDB
param.dialogReference: The file geodatabase to save the features classes to.

tool.summary: Loads features from 1 or more NATO Vector Graphics documents into Feature Classes
tool.usage:
• Loads one or more valid NATO Vector Graphics file in File GDB Feature Classes.

  • The output Geodatabase must be a file geodatabase

  • For each NVG file four output feature classes are generated.

  • A feature class is genereated for each type of POINT, POLYLINE, POLYGON or MULTIPOINT even if no features of that type are found.
